official_title: Joint resolution to authorize a procedure for acceptance or appropriation of funds for establishment of a sound and light performance on the east front of the U.S. Capitol.

summary.text: Authorizes the acceptance or appropriation of funds for the establishment of a sound and light performance on the east front of the United States Capitol.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize a procedure for acceptance or appropriation of funds for establishment of a sound and light performance on the east front of the U.S. Capitol.
